This is Gongaga Village.
Many people died here in a
Mako reactor explosion.

The Shinra people told us
that everyone would be happy
once the reactor was built.
But all it brought us was sadness

Shinra built the reactor,
without even thinking about
the town's safety.
And, this is the result.

One day, a huge explosion.
killed many of the townspeople

It's been a while since the explosion,
but you can still find the
pieces it left all over town.

We voted to outlaw the use of
Mako energy and live with nature,
ever since the explosion.

People can live without
the Shinra's Mako Reactors.

No matter how much I pray,
it won't bring our grandson back

You don't have enough money.

I am a traveling salesman,
